extendedInfo.description: With the help of wise Peter Pig, kids practice sorting and counting coins to earn money for their âbanksââall the while learning fun facts about U.S. currency. They learn to recognize and sort coins based on value, adding up multiple coins and more. The game was developed by Visa Inc. for elementary school aged kids 4-7.Â© Visa Inc.

reviews.title: NHM 373
reviews.comment: Great idea to teach children how to count money. It\'s fun but could use a little work on the graphics. It\'s entertaining and teaches children a great lesson on money skills. It could be a little hard for really young children.   Claire R. NHM 373
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Coins could be scaled up
reviews.comment: Nice app and teaching tool.  Coin images could be larger scale.
reviews.author: Joe Lavery

reviews.title: My son loves it!
reviews.comment: I just downloaded this app not even an hour ago and my son already loves it! He\'s always wondering about \"qwarters\" and if he has enough. This app lets him have fun and gives him a chance to learn as well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is great!!!! We need more apps that teach kids how to be financially responsible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun app for kids to learn about money
reviews.comment: My kids are really having fun with this! My 4 year old struggled a bit at first, but she is catching on. My 7 year old, who has learned about money in school, has a lot of fun with this game. I think it\'s a great way to teach kids about money and counting at the same time!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Peter Pig\'s Money Counter
reviews.comment: I was delighted to see a financial app for the Droid. However, this game might be difficult for people with vision problems. When the screen was zoomed in, the game seemed to move when I was attempting to move the coins. Sometimes it took more than once to access the correct coin jar on the money counting screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great apps for young students
reviews.comment: Great mix of audio and visual cues keep kids interested and motivated. This is a great way for kids to learn about how different sizes of money have different monetary values. Overall, well worth downloading and using to teach kids the basic of money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Personal financial skills can never be taught too early. This is a great app to get this kind of thinking in the youngsters. Great ideas, great variety, besides coins being hard to slide, they stack on top of each other and then are difficult to sort. I also would suggest if an amount is even and ends with a 0, like 15.40, that the all the digits in the amount are shown, not just 15.4. This will confuse the younger ones and is really not teaching them correctly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Money app that needs work
reviews.comment: I downloaded and reviewed with my 4 yr old son. It says is was compatiblefor my phone but we only saw partial of the program and when playing the games my son did not do so well, maybe good for older children and better on a bigger screen such s a tablet or pc.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cute little app...my kids will love it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nifty App!
reviews.comment: Very nifty!! What a neat way for kids to learn about money. It was challenging at first to drag the coins, but I caught on after a couple tries. Yay for educational apps! Thank you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like the idea and my 10 year old likes the games. However, the coins were hard to move and the games needed a little better directions. Nice facts!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Well done
reviews.comment: entertaining & educational. My daughter loves it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really like this app! Perfect for learning how to count money!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Couldn\'t see all graphics and words. Fun game for kids
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wow! Finally something that entertaining my kids!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very fun for my kids to play....liked that it was easy to learn and very ready to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great learning tool for children
reviews.comment: This makes learning money skills fun. Just what I need for my kids!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great to learn coins and money counting
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It wouldn\'t let me get past the second round and said I had miscounted the money in the jar when I know I didn\'t.
